snippet.title: DRAGON QUEST HEROES - Call to Arms! Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
TO ARMS!
The Kingdom of Arba has succumbed to an evil curse that has turned the once friendly monsters against the townsfolk and as either Luceus or Aurora it’s your duty as Royal Guards to defend the realm. Travel the world with heroes from across the legendary Dragon Quest series to save the Kingdom from the evil Velasco and foil his dastardly plan.

The Dragon Quest franchise returns to the west with Dragon Quest Heroes: The World Tree’s Woe and the Blight Below on PlayStation 4!

http://dragonquest-game.com/heroes/     

© 2015 ARMOR PROJECT/BIRD STUDIO/KOEI TECMO GAMES/SQUARE ENIX All Rights Reserved. © SUGIYAMA KOBO
